title: Genetic variability of FOXP2 and its targets CNTNAP2 and PRNP in frontotemporal dementia: A pilot study in a southern Italian population
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Paolina Crocco, Francesco De Rango, Francesco Bruno, Antonio Malvaso, Raffaele Maletta, Amalia C. Bruni, Giuseppe Passarino, Giuseppina Rose, Serena Dato
